Then the protectobots combine, then the Predacons combine, (Am I senseing a=
 pattern here?)
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dcoburn 
  To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, April 01, 2001 11:29 AM
  Subject: Re: =
CF Skimirsh


  OOC: Hehe Cyberwolf, don't forget there is also a neautral =
bounty hunter(Quatro) there.  And watch out, the Terrorcons can form Abomin=
us anytime!
  ::Cutthroat/Triggerhappy/Bodicons/Composer/Quatro::
   
     =
 Cutthroat is suddenly blinded by smoke.  He waved it away, and was enraged=
.
   
      "Cutthroat slag Autobot trash buckets!!!!" Cutthroat yelled.
  =
 
      Cutthroat shot a big stream of flame from his mouth at the CF.
  ~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Triggerhappy cackled, the=
n fired a compressed air shot from Blowpipe at the CF.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        The Bodicons saw this "Alliance" coming t=
o help the Maximals.
   
        "COMBINE!!!!!!!!" Decapitron yelled.
   
 =
       The other 4 Bodicons got close to Decapitron.  Then, their bodies al=
l got into the right positions and they formed a huge gestalt warrior calle=
d Surgital.
   
         "It's time for your operation!!!!" Surgital yelled=
 down at the Alliance members.
   
         The Bodicons all agreed on a ta=
rget.  Surgital's hand converted into a massive spinning saw.  He lowered h=
is hand down and attempted to cut Megaton in half.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         Composer eventually arrived at the scene.  H=
e landed beside Zardus.
   
         "My leader, I'm here to help you aid t=
he Maximals.  Wheeljack is coming as well," Composer informed Zardus of his=
 arrival.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Quatro coul=
d hear the battle all around him.  Quatro went outside and saw the gestalt =
warrior Surgital, and the Alliance coming to help Maximals.
   
        "Th=
e Maximals and their allies can fend off the Decepticons by themselves.  I'=
ve got a feeling that this is a big trick.  I have to see Megatron," Quatro=
 said to himself.
   
        Quatro ran around, trying to be stealthy so t=
hat nobody could see him.  He didn't want to waste power on using his steal=
th mode here.  Then, when he was away from the battle, he did a data search=
 on the Decepticons to try and find their base. 
   
         "Decepticon B=
ase:Dark Avian," Quatro said aloud.
   
         Quatro transformed to hove=
rbike mode, and speeded off towards the Dark Avian.
